entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
